data.eml:eml: Sinopyrophorinae, a new subfamily of Elateridae (Coleoptera, Elateroidea) with the first record of a luminous click beetle in Asia and evidence for multiple origins of bioluminescence in Elateridae

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Bi, Wen-Xuan, He *, Jin-Wu, Chen, Chang-Chin, Kundrata, Robin, Li, Xue-Yan (2019): Sinopyrophorinae, a new subfamily of Elateridae (Coleoptera, Elateroidea) with the first record of a luminous click beetle in Asia and evidence for multiple origins of bioluminescence in Elateridae. ZooKeys 864: 79-97, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.864.26689, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.864.26689
